item.description:
Saturday, November 14
Karma, Reincarnation and Meditation with Steve Grinold. Learn what the connection is between karma and meditation. How does meditation help free us from karmic burden? This profound workshop with mystic meditation awakens us to our spiritual potential and shows us how to tap unbounded spiritual energy. Free. Please register. 10 am to 1:30pm. Includes meditation time & lunch. Welles-Turner Memorial Library, 2407 Main Street, Glastonbury, CT, 06033. To register, 860 487-3597.




Correction - THIS MEET UP IS AT 10AM
item.name: Karma, Reincarnation and Meditation
